Many analysts have said that only the Philadelphia Eagles speedster Michael Vick is better at scrambling with the football. He may not be as fast as Michael Vick , but he's certainly as dangerous because he will pull it down and get considerable yardage, and he will throw accurately like he is in the pocket, NFL Network analyst Steve Mariucci told www.nj.com.`` When he leaves the pocket, he's scary.'' SHOW with DAVID LETTERMAN,'' MONDAY, FEB. 7( Aaron Rodgers walks out onstage as CBS Orchestra plays`` We Are the Champions,'' and audience gives him a standing ovation) David Letterman : We were talking a little bit about your itinerary for today. Under any circumstances, it would be grueling, but especially after winning the Super Bowl, MVP, and all of the traveling, thank you, thank you very much for the trouble. ( audience applauds) Aaron Rodgers :`` No, this is fun for me. I mean, this is-- I watch your show a lot.'' David Letterman :`` I appreciate that.
